name: Disco Duel
description:
The year is 1982. After paying off your house with your pay from your part time job, you hit up the local discotheque like you always do, only to be challenged to a dance battle by a homeboy trying to get all up in your grill. It's you need to cool off his ego a bit and show him what for. Good luck!

Controls:

1-3 Change dance style

Arrow keys Execute style
